TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_hangul, title = hangul, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/hangul} }

S.FORM: nakemasi "pakituluan tua ljingav nua tja kai (hunminjeongeum)" aicu a hangul (sinivecik nua hinankukuan: 한글; sinivecik nua binaljakan: Hangeul) mavan a sinivecik nua sihu nua sehankuk tua hinankukuan (kai nua sehankuk). na kitjuveqac ti sezung satjaljavavavan (Sejong the Great) tua hangul, saka papukeljangi taicu a sinivecik kemasi tua patagiljan tua 1900 a cavilj a patje tucu. a tja kineljang tu aicu a tja siaya a hangul avan a pinapungadan ni djusetjing (주시경; Ju Si-gyeong), pasamalavi tua patarevan nua hangul mavan a tjaljananguaqan a qaca a vecik ljaki qaca a vecik. saka aza vecik a namayatua sikudakuda nua sehankuk. == kinasizuanan ==

nakemasi "pakitoloan toa ljingav noa tja kai (honminjeongeom)" aico a hangol (sinivecik noa hinankokoan: 한글; sinivecik noa binaljakan: Hangeol) mavan a sinivecik noa siho noa sehankok toa hinankokoan (kai noa sehankok). na kitjoveqac ti sezong satjaljavavavan (Sejong the Great) toa hangol, saka papokeljangi taico a sinivecik kemasi toa patagiljan toa 1900 a cavilj a patje toco. a tja kineljang to aico a tja siaya a hangol avan a pinapongadan ni djosetjing (주시경; Jo Si-gyeong), pasamalavi toa patarevan noa hangol mavan a tjaljanangoaqan a qaca a vecik ljaki qaca a vecik. saka aza vecik a namayatoa sikodakoda noa sehankok. == kinasizoanan ==
